name: Alice in Wonderland AR quest
description:
You can enter the Wonderland right here. Look, there is a hole in the floor. The white rabbit comes out of it. Follow him! Open the portal to the Wonderland and go through it.

In-app purchases:
- Unlock the second portal!
- Make the white rabbit happy with new costumes purchased for coins!

It's Augmented Reality game, so you will need to grant an access to iPhone's camera to play it.

*WARNING!* You need a safe and clear area to play the game. Don't play it near traffic area, on the roofs, balconies, and at other places walking blindly could be dangerous at.
